children.heading: Purpose
children.text: The purpose of HAS is to provide and maintain every details of hostel management staff, catering staff, customers etc. on single click. The manager and receptionist will have the privilege to access the whole database and they can update in it. Customers can easily have services like registration, login, room booking, payment etc.

attributesChanged.text: The purpose of HAS is to provide and maintain every details of hostel management staff, catering staff, customers etc. on single click.

children.heading: Scope
children.text: HAS will simplify the day by day processes of the hotel. Customers and staff can access information via application or on the spot. The database will be used to store the whole data so that it can be used for further access.

attributesChanged.text: HAS will simplify the day by day processes of the hotel. Customers and staff can access information via application or on the spot.

children.heading: Product perspective
children.text: The database should contains the details of customers like name, phone number, their booking details. It also contains room details like room no, type, rate, duration of stay etc.

attributesChanged.text: The database should contains the details of customers, room details, catering food stock etc.

children.heading: System interfaces
children.text: The system should be promoted by the database. The database will contains customer details and room details.

attributesChanged.text: The system should be promoted by the database with the details of rooms, catering and customers.
The system should be promoted by the database. The database will

children.heading: User interfaces
children.text: It should be an application or website on browser. It should have services like booking, bill generator, payment and access to database for some extend as per their role. The users are customer, manager, receptionist.

attributesChanged.text: It should be an application or website with facilities like booking, bill generator and access to database for some extend and it can be able to run on browsers.

children.heading: Hardware interfaces
children.text: The website or application should be able to run on any browser in any electronic devices like desktop computer, mobile, laptop, tablet etc.

attributesChanged.text: The website or application should be able to run on any browser in any electronic devices.
The website or application should be able to run on any browser in any electronic devices like pc, mobile, laptop etc.

children.heading: Software interfaces
children.text: Web server and database server will be used in OS like windows, ubuntu. The backend development will be created with the use of Java, HTML, JavaScript.

attributesChanged.text: Web server and database server will be OS like windows, ubuntu. The backend development will be created by Java, HTML, JavaScript.

children.heading: Communications interfaces
children.text: The system shall be using HTTP or HTTPS protocol  for communication over Internet. It shall use TCP or IP protocol for intranet communication.

attributesChanged.text: The system shall be using HTTP or HTTPS protocol  for communication over Internet and for intranet communications, it shall use TCP or IP protocol.

children.heading: Memory constraints
children.text:
The system is web based so the storage concern will not happen. Users will get required storage space.

Use of dissent RAM will solve the RAM concern.

attributesChanged.text: The system is web based so the storage concern will not happen. Use of dissent RAM will solve the RAM concern.

children.heading: Operations
children.text:
Customer can register for services by providing username and phone number and other details.

To get the room details, customer should choose room type and duration first.

Payment method should be chosen to make safe payment and after that bill will be generated with details.

The database should be update at a time.

attributesChanged.text:
The room details and booking service should be done by website or application.

The database should be update at a time.

There should be a bill generator with all particular services.

Payment method should be chosen to make safe payment and after that bill will be generated.

children.heading: Interfaces with  services
children.text:
Customer should login or register using email/phone number with password.

There should be facility for registration or updating in database for customers, manager, receptionist.

attributesChanged.text:
Login using email/phone number with password.

There should be facility for registration or updating in database.

Login or register using email/phone number with password.

children.heading: Product functions
children.text:
There will be a function for Registration which will be used by customers to register for bookings and other access.

Customer can see room details and book rooms after login so the Login function will be available.

A function will provide all details of rooms with availability, type, rate.

A function will available to see the details of existing customers.

There will be a function to generate bill.

The customers will have access of payment function for safe payment.

attributesChanged.text: There will be first Login, Sign up. Then room details with availability, booking details, payment with different methods and feedback acceptance.
There will be first Login or Register. Then room details with availability, booking details, payment with different methods and feedback acceptance.

children.heading: User  characteristics
children.text:
Manager - He / She should be able to have access of the whole database of hotel so that he / she can perform any task related to booking or updating.

Receptionist - He / She should be able to update the details of the database according to customer details, room allotment and availability.

Customer - He / She should have access of the database of room details like room type, rate, booking, availability.

attributesChanged.text:
Manager - He / She should be able to have access of the whole database of hotel so that he / she can perform any task related to booking or managing.

Receptionist - He / She should be able to update the details of the database according to customer details, room allotment and availability.

Customer - He / She should have access of the database of room details like room type, rate, booking, availability.

children.heading: Limitations
children.text:
Customers must register through website or application after he/she can have access of other facilities.

Customers cannot see the details of other users. They can only see the details of all rooms.

Only manager and receptionist have access to see the whole database.

attributesChanged.text: Customers must register through website or application after he/she can have access of other facilities.

children.heading: Assumptions and dependencies
children.text:
After registration, customer will have valid credentials for login.  They will be provided username and password for their safety.

Customer should provide valid details in registration.

attributesChanged.text:
After registration, customer will have valid credentials for login.

Customer should provide valid details in registration.

children.text: Features and services are already discussed.

children.heading: External interfaces
children.text: Different payment methods will be used for payment so it will make connection with different bank portals.

attributesChanged.text: For payment method,

children.heading: Functions
children.text:
Register : Customers can register by providing name, phone number, age etc. private details. Customer will also be provide username and password for login.

Login : Customer can login using username and password after they can go for further services.

Customer Details : Manager or receptionist can see all details of particular customers.

Room Details : Any user characters can use this function to see the room details like room type, rate, availability, duration of stay.

Add Customer : Receptionist can add customer details to the database and allot them rooms as per their requirements.

Available Rooms : Receptionist and manager can see total number of available room details.

Update Rates : Manager or receptionist can update rates of rooms on special occasions. 

Booked Rooms : Manager and receptionist can see the details of booked rooms like customer name, room number, type, rate etc.

Generate Bill : Manager and receptionist can generate bill of customers by providing customer name and room number.

Book Room : Customer can book room by using this function after selecting room type and rate.

Payment : Customer can do payment by using this service.

Feedback : Customer can give any feedback.

children.heading: Usability requirements
children.text: There should be a user guide tour for new customers so that the usage of website or application will be easy for them.

attributesChanged.text: There should be a user guide tour for new customers.

children.heading: Performance requirements
children.text: After successful login or registration, the customer profile will be visible with name and necessary details.

attributesChanged.text: After successful login or registration, the profile will be visible with name

children.heading: Logical database requirements
children.text: User data is kept on application and website and also in database.

children.heading: Design constraints
children.text: To make system more responsive there will be worker and queue model (Queue will have the messages and worker will triggered and execute when it receive messages from the queue).

attributesChanged.text: To make system more responsive there will be worker and queue model(Queue will have the messages and worker will triggered and execute when it receive messages from the queue).

children.heading: Standards compliance
children.text: There will be secured payment under payment security standards.
